short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image resizing,resolution adjustment,image rotation,image watermarking,image compression,image to PDF,poster generation,and more.
short.zh_CN: 强大的图片处理工具，包括图片尺寸修改、分辨率调整、图片旋转、图片加水印、图片压缩、图片转PDF、图片海报生成等。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ImageCraft - Your All-in-One Image Processing Assistant

ImageCraft is a powerful image processing tool that provides you with a one-stop solution for image editing:

• Image Resizing: Easily adjust image dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio
• ID Photo Creation: Quickly generate various specifications of ID photos
• Resolution Adjustment: Change image DPI with one click to enhance image quality
• Image Rotation: Flexibly rotate image angles and correct orientation
• Watermark Addition: Support text and image watermarks to protect copyright

Key Features:
- Batch processing of multiple images
- Multiple output formats available: PNG, JPEG, WebP, etc.
- Clean and intuitive interface design for easy operation
- Completely offline operation to protect your privacy and security

Whether you're an individual user or a professional photographer, ImageCraft can meet all your image processing needs. 

Download ImageCraft and make image editing easy and simple, Easily edit images, rotate pictures, add watermarks, and complete all your image processing tasks in one place.
long.zh_CN:
图片工坊 - 您的全能图片处理助手

图片工坊是一款功能强大的图片处理工具,为您提供一站式图片编辑解决方案:

• 图片缩放:轻松调整图片尺寸,保持宽高比例
• 证件照制作:快速生成各种规格的证件照
• 分辨率调整:一键更改图片DPI,提升图片质量
• 图片旋转:灵活旋转图片角度,纠正方向
• 水印添加:支持文字和图片水印,保护版权

特色功能:
- 支持批量处理多张图片
- 多种输出格式可选:PNG、JPEG、WebP等
- 简洁直观的界面设计,操作便捷
- 完全离线工作,保护您的隐私安全

无论您是需要缩放图片的个人用户，还是经常调整分辨率的专业摄影师，图片工坊都能满足您的各种图片处理需求。

下载使用我们的工具，让图片处理变得轻松简单，轻松进行图片编辑，旋转图片，添加水印，一站式完成所有图片处理工作。


ImageCraft - Your All-in-One Image Processing Assistant

ImageCraft is a powerful image processing tool that provides you with a one-stop solution for image editing:

• Image Resizing: Easily adjust image dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio
• ID Photo Creation: Quickly generate various specifications of ID photos
• Resolution Adjustment: Change image DPI with one click to enhance image quality
• Image Rotation: Flexibly rotate image angles and correct orientation
• Watermark Addition: Support text and image watermarks to protect copyright

Key Features:
- Batch processing of multiple images
- Multiple output formats available: PNG, JPEG, WebP, etc.
- Clean and intuitive interface design for easy operation
- Completely offline operation to protect your privacy and security

Whether you're an individual user or a professional photographer, ImageCraft can meet all your image processing needs. 

Download ImageCraft and make image editing easy and simple, Easily edit images, rotate pictures, add watermarks, and complete all your image processing tasks in one place.
